text: Pasterka () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Radków, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately west of Radków, west of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 50. == External links == * official website Pasterka ==References== Pasterka
title: Pasterka, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
